languages.text: [Осторожно коснуться плеча] "Ты ранен. И ты потерял своих товарищей. Дай себе передышку, позволь мне позаботиться о тебе. Я сам{mf||а} возьму Саргону".
[Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."
languages.original_text: [Осторожно коснуться плеча] "Ты ранен. И ты потерял своих товарищей. Дай себе передышку, позволь мне позаботиться о тебе. Я сам{mf||а} возьму Саргону".

[Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

[Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

languages.text: [そっとソロモーンの肩に触れる]「君は傷ついている。仲間も失った。後は任せて君は休んでいろ。サルゴナの相手は{mf|俺|私}がする」
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [そっとソロモーンの肩に触れる]「君は傷ついている。仲間も失った。後は任せて君は休んでいろ。サルゴナの相手は{mf|俺|私}がする」

languages.text: [Sanft Solomornes Schulter berühren] "Ihr seid verwundet. Ihr habt Eure Kameraden verloren. Ihr solltet Euch ausruhen und Euch von mir versorgen lassen. Ich stelle Sargona allein zur Rede."
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [Sanft Solomornes Schulter berühren] "Ihr seid verwundet. Ihr habt Eure Kameraden verloren. Ihr solltet Euch ausruhen und Euch von mir versorgen lassen. Ich stelle Sargona allein zur Rede."

languages.text: [Toucher doucement l'épaule de Solomorne] « Vous êtes blessé. Vous avez perdu vos confrères. Vous devriez vous reposer et me laisser prendre soin de vous. Je m'occuperai de Sargona moi-même. »
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [Toucher doucement l'épaule de Solomorne] « Vous êtes blessé. Vous avez perdu vos confrères. Vous devriez vous reposer et me laisser prendre soin de vous. Je m'occuperai de Sargona moi-même. »

languages.text: [Tocar suavemente el hombro de Solomorne] «Está herido. Ha perdido a sus camaradas. Debería descansar y dejarme que me ocupe de usted. Me enfrentaré a Sargona yo {mf|mismo|misma}».
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [Tocar suavemente el hombro de Solomorne] «Está herido. Ha perdido a sus camaradas. Debería descansar y dejarme que me ocupe de usted. Me enfrentaré a Sargona yo {mf|mismo|misma}».

languages.text: [轻轻抚摸索罗蒙的肩膀]“你受了伤，还失去了你的战友。你得好好休息一下，让我来照顾你吧。我会亲自面对萨戈纳。”
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [轻轻抚摸索罗蒙的肩膀]“你受了伤，还失去了你的战友。你得好好休息一下，让我来照顾你吧。我会亲自面对萨戈纳。”

languages.text: [Solomorne'un omzuna hafifçe dokun] "Yaralısın. Yoldaşlarını kaybettin. Dinlenmeli ve seninle ilgilenmeme izin vermelisin. Sargona'yla yüzleşebilirim."
languages.original_text: [Gently touch Solomorne's shoulder] "You are wounded. You have lost your comrades. You should rest and let me take care of you. I will confront Sargona myself."

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne'un omzuna hafifçe dokun] "Yaralısın. Yoldaşlarını kaybettin. Dinlenmeli ve seninle ilgilenmeme izin vermelisin. Sargona'yla yüzleşebilirim."
